title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Launch WSWB and create two projects. 2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt'). 3. From the main menu, select File -> Export and select 'Zip File' to export.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name but from different directories to a zip file, the export process fails and an error message is displayed.
EB: The software should successfully export multiple files with the same name but from different directories to a zip file without any errors.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Launch the software and open two projects. 2. Create a new file with the same name in each project. 3. Select 'File' from the main menu, then choose 'Export' and 'Zip File'. 4. Follow the prompts to export the files. Check that the export process completes successfully without any error messages.
